title: The three sisters teares Shed at the late solemne funerals of the royall deceased Henry, Prince of Wales, &c. R.N. Oxon.
author: Niccols, Richard, 1584-1616.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Richard Redmer, and are to be sould at his shop neere the west dore of Paules Church,
